alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Inland Bay; Liberty; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 3:48PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bay and central Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, northwestern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida and southeastern Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 430 PM EST/330 PM CST/... At 348 PM EST/248 PM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles northeast of Lynn Haven, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Orange, Bristol, Clarksville, Abe Springs, Fountain, Singer Road, Red Hill, Gainer Spring, Scotts Ferry, Kennys Mill, Bennett, Estiffanulga, Youngstown, Porter Lake, Hugh Creek, Red Oak, Sharpstown, Saunders and Marysville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
